heading: HR02463
0: A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN CONDEMNING THE JANUARY 30, 2019 GRENADE ATTACK ON A MOSQUE IN ZAMBOANGA CITY, EXTENDING ITS PROFOUND SYMPATHY TO THE FAMILIES OF THE VICTIMS, AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE TO CONDUCT AN IN-DEPTH INVESTIGATION AND FILE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST THE PERPETRATORS
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-01-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02463
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN CONDEMNING THE JANUARY 30, 2019 GRENADE ATTACK ON A MOSQUE IN ZAMBOANGA CITY, EXTENDING ITS PROFOUND SYMPATHY TO THE FAMILIES OF THE VICTIMS, AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE TO CONDUCT AN IN-DEPTH INVESTIGATION AND FILE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST THE PERPETRATORS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DALIPE, MANUEL JOSE "MANNIX" M.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-30
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2019-01-30
